title: Dead Man's Curve
description: Gavin is on his way home after an 'all nighter' work shift in his tweaked brand new fast car. As the drizzle begins to fall and a looming sharp bend in the road takes him unawares, he day dreams about the latest love of his life - Joyce. From this day on nothing is quite the same for Gavin ever again after he discovers that Joyce died in a car crash on that same day. http://www.amazon.co.uk/s/ref=ntt_ath...
author: Gerald Neal
